main.name: Taro Nakamura
main.description: A programmer proficient in Python enjoying surfing with friends.
main.bio: I have been working on front-to-back technology systems in the financial industry for 14 years. I like to work in a flat environment with hands-on people from across the globe in various business functions including trading, sales, support, settlement and risk - both technology users and development teams. For the last 3 years I have been the head of the Asia branch of Quartz, BAMLâ€™s global cross-asset trading and risk management platform, while remaining a hands-on developer of financial technology.
main.contactmessage: As an enthusiastic engineer I am looking forward to working with you on any challenging tasks you can bring to me. Please contact me either in English or in Japanese, or both :)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
